subject: Self-Defense
Basketball
Law and Legislation
Gun Control
Decisions and Verdicts
Local Government
lead_paragraph: The confluence of law, government, sports and the threat of violence create a stark backdrop for Gilbert Arenas’s decision to store several guns in a Washington, D.C., locker room.
